statements: SELECT respondent_id, age, gender, location FROM respondent_demographics;
SELECT age, gender, location, respondent_id FROM respondent_demographics ORDER BY respondent_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM respondent_demographics WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT age, location, respondent_id FROM respondent_demographics  WHERE age > 30;
SELECT gender, age FROM respondent_demographics ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC;
SELECT * FROM respondent_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT respondent_id, age FROM respondent_demographics WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM respondent_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location LIKE 'Los%'
SELECT respondent_id, location FROM respondent_demographics ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM respondent_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT * FROM respondent_demographics WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT respondent_name, age FROM respondent_demographics WHERE age < 30;
SELECT location FROM respondent_demographics ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT respondent_name, survey_question, response_text FROM respondent_demographics JOIN survey_responses ON respondent_demographics.respondent_id = survey_responses.respondent_id;
SELECT * FROM respondent_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY respondent_name DESC;
SELECT respondent_id, respondent_name, age FROM respondent_demographics WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT respondent_id, location, response_text FROM respondent_demographics JOIN survey_responses ON respondent_demographics.respondent_id = survey_responses.respondent_id;

SELECT respondent_name, survey_question FROM respondent_demographics JOIN survey_responses ON respondent_demographics.respondent_id = survey_responses.respondent_id WHERE response_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC;

SELECT respondent_name, age, location, survey_question, response_text FROM respondent_demographics LEFT JOIN survey_responses ON respondent_demographics.respondent_id = survey_responses.respondent_id;
SELECT * FROM Respondents ORDER BY respondent_id DESC;
SELECT respondent_name, age, profession FROM Respondents WHERE age > 30;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM Surveys WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT respondent_name, gender, profession FROM Respondents WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM Surveys ORDER BY survey_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Respondents WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY respondent_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT respondent_name, profession FROM Respondents WHERE profession = 'Engineer' AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM Responses WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM Surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY survey_date ASC;

SELECT r.respondent_name, s.survey_name, rs.response_value FROM Respondents r JOIN Responses rs ON r.respondent_id = rs.respondent_id JOIN Surveys s ON rs.survey_id = s.survey_id WHERE r.age < 40 AND s.survey_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM respondents;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM respondents WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, name, start_date FROM surveys ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT response_date, response FROM responses WHERE survey_id = 1 ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT respondent_id, location FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM respondents ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT respondents.first_name, respondents.age, surveys.name FROM respondents JOIN responses ON respondents.id = responses.respondent_id JOIN surveys ON responses.survey_id = surveys.id WHERE surveys.start_date < '2023-01-01';

SELECT respondents.first_name, respondents.gender, responses.response FROM respondents JOIN responses ON respondents.id = responses.respondent_id WHERE responses.response_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT respondents.first_name, COUNT(responses.id) AS total_responses FROM respondents JOIN responses ON respondents.id = responses.respondent_id GROUP BY respondents.first_name HAVING total_responses > 5;

SELECT respondents.first_name, demographics.location, demographics.income FROM respondents JOIN demographics ON respondents.id = demographics.respondent_id WHERE demographics.education_level = 'Bachelor' ORDER BY demographics.income DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM respondent_demographics;
SELECT respondent_id, age, gender, income FROM respondent_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT respondent_id, location FROM respondent_demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM survey_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM respondent_demographics ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC
SELECT respondent_id, age, gender FROM respondent_demographics WHERE location='New York' AND income > 50000
SELECT survey_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM survey_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE question1='Feedback' AND answer1='Positive'
SELECT target_name, criteria FROM survey_targets
